dmca.title: shopforphones.co.uk doesn't want shoppers phoning infringing competitors
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam,

This DMCA complaint covers multiple copies of multiple pages across different web sites. Please remove the infringing pages from your index and also remove any duplicate content penalty applied to my site as a result of this unlawful copying.

Incident 1
1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on the following page:
http://www.shopforphones.co.uk/nokia-n90.htm
2. The infringing web page can be found by searching for "camera twist around, and the internal
display is a very"
3. The infringing web page is: http://www.openrussia.ru/catalogitems/3183/Nokia-N90.htm
4. The infringer's contact details are:
OpenRussia,
[private]
Rostov on Don, 344022
Russia
Tel./Fax: [private]

Incident 2
1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on the following page:
http://www.shopforphones.co.uk/motorola-rokr-e1.htm
2. The infringing web page can be found by searching for "The cool looks of the ROKR E1
complement the device"
3. The infringing web page is:
http://www.celluloco.com/products/customer/product.php?productid=580
4. The infringer's contact details are:
The Loco Group of Miami
[private]
Miami, Florida 33139
United States
3054980480
[private]@msn.com
